title: # 280 - Dan St. Germain & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with comedian Dan St. Germain and we talk about what goes into writing for television, OCD, party stories, and more! 

 

Check out Dan's podcast "Total F'n Marks - Another Goddamn Wresting Podcast"

Dan's album "No Real Winners Here" comes out May 12th

This Episode is brought to you by Spotify. Bertcast is now on Spotify so download the mobile app or go to www.spotify.com to listen now!

This episode is also brought to you by Beach Body. For your free 30 day trial membership text Bert to 303030

This episode is also brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $100 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast  

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
